MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY18 postcode area of Llanidloes, affecting properties in Tylwch, Llidiartywaun and surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a broken overhead equipment and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.55pm on 11th of January 2021.
